short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject HTML into Gmail's compose message area to send HTML email templates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sending HTML in Gmail is tricky. 

Send HTML in Gmail extension gives you a textarea to paste your HTML into so you can easily add it when composing your new message in Gmail.
